column2: Tao Digital India Private Limited is looking for Mid CDK proactive/ Bench CDK global Delivery proactive hire/Bench to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Mid-Level CDK Proactive/Bench CDK Global Delivery Proactive Hire/Bench, you will be a pivotal member of our global delivery team, specializing in CDK (Continuous Delivery Kit) proactive initiatives and bench management      You will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth delivery of CDK projects, actively managing the bench, and proactively hiring talent to meet project demands      Your expertise in CDK methodologies, project management, and talent acquisition will contribute to the success of our global delivery operations        Key Responsibilities:        CDK Proactive Initiatives: Lead proactive initiatives focused on enhancing CDK processes, methodologies, and tooling to improve delivery efficiency, quality, and customer satisfaction      Collaborate with stakeholders to identify areas for improvement and implement best practices in CDK adoption      Bench Management: Manage the bench of resources available for CDK projects, including consultants, developers, testers, and other technical professionals      Maintain an up-to-date inventory of skills, availability, and project preferences      Strategically allocate bench resources to projects based on demand and skillset requirements      Proactive Hiring: Proactively identify, attract, and onboard talent to augment the bench and meet project demands      Develop talent pipelines through networking, referrals, and recruitment events      Conduct interviews, assess candidate skills and qualifications, and make hiring recommendations to management      Resource Allocation: Work closely with project managers, delivery leads, and account managers to understand project requirements and resource needs      Collaborate with the bench team to allocate resources effectively, balancing project demands, skill availability, and resource utilization      Talent Development: Support the professional development of bench resources through training, mentoring, and career coaching      Identify opportunities for skills enhancement and provide guidance on certification programs, technical training, and career advancement paths      Performance Management: Monitor the performance and productivity of bench resources assigned to projects      Provide feedback, coaching, and performance evaluations to ensure high-quality delivery and client satisfaction      Address performance issues and escalate as needed      Stakeholder Communication: Communicate regularly with stakeholders, including project teams, clients, and senior management, to provide updates on bench availability, resource allocations, and proactive hiring initiatives      Proactively manage expectations and address any concerns or conflicts related to resource assignments      Continuous Improvement: Continuously evaluate and improve CDK delivery processes, methodologies, and talent management practices      Solicit feedback from stakeholders and bench resources to identify opportunities for optimization and innovation

column2: The job of a Project Manager(PM) is responsible for project activities including work estimation, planning, stakeholder management and project quality and should own partnership with cross-functional technology and to design teams to ensure consistent, beneficial client interaction and solution delivery. The PM should ensure that resources are leveraged appropriately.      The PM will be responsible for the deliverables under the pre-sales activities as well.        The PM to work directly with the implementation team to ensure delivery and implementation of the automation solution and will work with the management and the pre-sales team to ensure quality output.          Skills and Experience Required          Experience in Design & Implementation of Robotics Process Automation      5 years of professional experience on automation and/or integration projects      Good exposure to Business process Analysis and automation      A track record in training and mentoring individuals on development and delivery disciplines      The ability to methodically solve business and technical problems using innovative and well-planned approaches with well documented, supportable and extensible developments      Excellent leadership stakeholder management capabilities      Require ability to understand coding logic (added advantage)      Knowledge of scrum and agile methodology          Responsibilities          Team Management, process management and compliance with quality standards; ensuring project delivery within time, cost and quality specifications      Understanding complex business scenarios      Review solutions/architecture      Drive realization of the agreed requirement, Manage Global/Remote delivery and Operations      Understand customer requirements & build solutions      Track and publish performance to target dates & deliverables      Manage People & Operations: Interviews, training, mentoring, operational activities, own and resolve cross-functional issues, internal stakeholder escalations      Oversee effort estimation/business case for new projects

column2: Summary     Northern Trust is looking for a Cloud DevOps Engineer. This person will work within a team to design and develop multi-platform cloud solutions for business app teams migrating functions to the cloud. This can include, but is not limited to, conducting technical cloud implementations, supporting the cloud operations, accessing and using cloud resources for a global cloud platform to automate via Terraform, working with various technology teams to resolve technical issues for managed software, and working with Solutions & Application Architects on evolving business requirements while building best practices, with a focus on automation.   Minimum Qualifications Bachelors degree in computer science, Mathematics, or a related technical field. 9+ years of professional      experience in Infrastructure and Cloud. 5 years of Cloud experience (primary into MS Azure.) 4 years of professional experience in Python, Terraform, Azure      DevOps, GitHub, PowerShell, CLI, Bash Scripting, Ansible, SQL to automate      provisioning of cloud resources and configurations CI/CD. Primary Skills Strong technical subject matter expertise and practical experience in the DevOps Engineering specifically on Azure Cloud including administrative knowledge on deploying infrastructure components and configuring it for optimum Cost, Performance and Security standards. Secured data access archiving and back-up Network Deploying and configuring virtual networks orchestrating routing paths/hybrid cloud managing public and private IP addresses Security Azure Active Directory (hybrid AD), Reducing surface attack on all azure resources. Experience of Infrastructure Deployments tools such as Terraform, Azure DevOps, PowerShell, to automate provisioning of cloud resources and configurations CI/CD is preferable. 1. Build, deploy, and support/maintain Networking, Databases, Software, and Servers within the Azure environment (IaaS, PaaS and SaaS) using Terraform (No ClickOps).  2. Understanding of Security and Compliance tools including Azure Policy, Defender for Cloud, Sentinel or equivalent tools. 3. Interact directly with OEM support and/or vendors for enhancements. 4. Assists with evaluation, analysis and maintenance of equipment to meet technical and security standards.  Deliver an optimized      infrastructure services design, automated systems leveraging public, and      hybrid Cloud architectures and services with Azure. Hands-on experience engineering,      deploying, and managing CI/CD pipelines in an enterprise scale environment      utilizing  GitHub ,  Azure DevOps , or any other build      automation tool. Experience with source control, such as GIT or Azure      Repos, in a collaborative development environment. Knowledge of IP networking, VPNs, VPCs, DNS, load      balancers, security groups, firewalls,  Hub/Spoke architecture ,      security guardrails for Azure. Strong debugging skills to identify      issues and provide solutions. Knowledge of migration strategy and migration      process will be value added (on-prem to Azure environment) Well versed with ITIL framework and managing Follow-the-Sun      remote teams. Excellent collaboration skills to handle      multi-cultural, multi-location teams and drive end-to-end implementations. Secondary Skills An Agile mindset with the ability to adapt to      changing priorities and requirements. Excellent communication and      documentation skills leveraging the Atlassian Stack (JIRA, Confluence). An understanding of production environments,      including the requirement for high availability and team oriented 24x7      support capabilities. Ability to lead the team as a SME to resolve issues      and co-ordinate with business.

column2: Looking for Enthusiastic, Well Spoken Youngsters to be a part of our energetic team at our head office in Mumbai. The Candidate must be outspoken, looking to make a career in the Banking and Financial Services Industry and hungry for growth.  We are presently recruiting for a Business Development profile and are looking for candidates who can drive our Growth further.  We are open to hiring Candidates across most streams with Graduation being the basic requirement. Preference will be given to candidates with 1-2 years of work experience in Sales/Business Development profiles. Freshers who feel they can excel in their work may also apply.  Your Take home salary will comprise of an In Hand Fixed Salary between 15,000 to 40,000 per month plus performance based incentives, perks, trips, etc.  Males and Females are both welcome. This is not a field job. You would be working from our office in Andheri East. Travel would be very limited and would be within the city only if required.  The work would comprise of: 1. The candidate would be making calls to Directors/CFOs of SMEs and other corporates based on leads provided as well as self-generated and pitching across the Services of CAPSTONE to them. He/She would then fix up an appointment with the prospective customer. Tele calling shall form a major part of the job profile for the first few months of the job 2. The candidate would then meet the customer personally along with his/her senior and  understand the requirements of the client, evaluate the client's financial strengths and  weaknesses and suggest the best possible funding structure that would suit the prospective  company requirements. 3. The candidate would then be expected to correspond with the client and our in-house execution team and complete the required documentation for the proposal. 4. The candidate would also at times correspond with the required bankers to explain the requirements and the strengths of the client to ensure smooth sanctioning by the banks.  5. Once the deal is sanctioned by the bank, the candidate would be responsible for completing the disbursement procedures and closing the deal Working Hours : Monday to Friday 10.30 am to 6.30 pm, 1st and 2nd Saturdays of the Month shall be a holiday. Salary   and   Remuneration: The Package of the candidate will include a fixed salary + variable incentive pay based on the  revenues generated for the company. ??Fixed Salary per month depending upon the knowledge, skill, and experience of the candidates. ??Good variable performance-based incentives as a percentage of company revenues.
